h2_title: Green-Capped Martialist Boss Fight and Guide
content: The Martialist can also deflect your blows if you attempt to hit him with an extended light attack combo, holding his weapon out in front of him, and will then vanish to appear to the side of you to counter (but you can also turn the tables on him by being ready with a Rock Solid of your own).
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Green-Capped_Martialist.md', within the main section titled 'Green-Capped Martialist', specifically from the subsection 'Green-Capped Martialist Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
The Martialist can also deflect your blows if you attempt to hit him with an extended light attack combo, holding his weapon out in front of him, and will then vanish to appear to the side of you to counter (but you can also turn the tables on him by being ready with a Rock Solid of your own).
